scripts.ui: vue-cli-service build --target lib --report --name huteming-ui --dest packages/ui/dist --report packages/ui/index.js
scripts.build:uilib: npm run b:1 && npm run b:2 && npm run b:4
scripts.util: vue-cli-service build --target lib --report --name huteming-util --dest packages/util/dist --report packages/util/index.js
scripts.b:1: npm run car && npm run cai && npm run clo && npm run fle && npm run fli && npm run inf && npm run inp
scripts.b:2: npm run pia && npm run pid && npm run pir && npm run pic && npm run pii && npm run pop && npm run tab && npm run tap && npm run tac
scripts.b:3: npm run ani && npm run api && npm run cad && npm run req && npm run rol && npm run sto && npm run too && npm run val && npm run wxd
scripts.b:4: npm run btp && npm run dia && npm run anc && npm run toa && npm run mes
scripts.carousel: cross-env BUILD_MODE=lib vue-cli-service build --target lib --report --name carousel --dest packages/@ui/carousel/dist packages/@ui/carousel/_index.js
scripts.panel: cross-env BUILD_MODE=lib vue-cli-service build --target lib --report --name panel --dest packages/@ui/panel/dist packages/@ui/panel/index.js
